definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

pinyin: chuang1 shang1 hou4 ya1 li4 wen3 luan4
chuang1 shang1 hou4 xin1 li3 ya1 li4 jin3 zhang1 zong1 he2 zheng4
containing_words.word: 创伤后心理压力紧张综合症

definition: (jocularly) to be under great pressure (a pun on 亞歷山大|亚历山大[Ya4 li4 shan1 da4])

sentences.english: He self-reflected and decided to decrease the stress and clean up his diet, looking beyond the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 他能自我反醒并决定减少压力和调整饮食，改变现状。

sentences.english: Ageing will put pressure on societies at all levels.
sentences.chinese: 老龄问题将对社会各阶层带来压力。

sentences.english: He eased some of the strains on the poor.
I am shy and find social situations stressful.
sentences.chinese: 我很怕羞，觉得社会场合有压力。

sentences.english: They rely on police and media pressure to reform such businesses, he added.
sentences.chinese: 他们依靠警方和媒体压力来改革此类营生，他说。

sentences.english: We do not want to face US pressures on our own.
sentences.chinese: 我们不希望独自承受来自美国的压力。

sentences.english: Peer review will need to be peer pressure.
sentences.chinese: 同侪评审需要深化为同侪压力。

sentences.english: Objectives To study the baroreflex function in patients with vasovagal syncope.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价血管迷走性晕厥患者的压力反射器功能。

sentences.english: His coach Sun Haiping said he was worried about the great pressure on Liu Xiang at this time.
sentences.chinese: 教练孙海平对刘翔此次所承受的压力表示担心。

sentences.english: It is also continuously and augmentative for the own pressure and weight .
sentences.chinese: 给自己的压力和分量也是不停的增加的。

sentences.english: Swelling the fundamental law is one common kind of pressure processes in restoring parts.
sentences.chinese: 胀大法是压力加工修复常用的一种方法。

sentences.english: When the pressure gets low the boiling-point becomes low.
sentences.chinese: 如果大气压力低，沸点就低。

sentences.english: Can be based on specifications set the value to calculate the bending stress values.
sentences.chinese: 能，可依据规格设定值来计算出折曲压力值。

sentences.english: Higher equivalent stress was found when compression and extension loadings were applied to the pedicle of vertebral arch and interarticularis.
sentences.chinese: 椎弓根和椎弓峡部在压力和后伸负荷下等效应力较高。

sentences.english: Enlarging the sectional area of surge tank obviously changes minimum pressure in draft tube.
sentences.chinese: 增大调压室面积会明显改变尾水管最小压力值。

sentences.english: The link is the growing strain on the world"s sole superpower. America is locked into a draining and demoralising war."
sentences.chinese: 这个联系就是全球唯一超级大国面临的压力日益增加。

definition: (jocularly) to be under great pressure (a pun on 亞歷山大|亚历山大[Ya4 li4 shan1 da4])
variant of 衝擊|冲击[chong1 ji1]
to attack/to batter/(of waves) to pound against/shock/impact
to face sth/to be confronted with
to bring relief/to alleviate (a crisis)/to dull (a pain)
